successes.title: New Solar Technology to Build an Underground Park
successes.description: The Lowline will use new solar technology to transform an historic NYC trolley terminal into the world's first underground park.

Pledges.description: SALT OF EARTH: We add your name to our website and we send you a virtual hug. Because we love you
BUILDER: We proudly add your name to our Lowline Lab "hero wall" this September so you can brag to your friends that you supported us + we add your name to our website (tax-deductible portion: $10)
SEEDLING: Get a magic postcard with embedded Lowline-inspired seeds you can plant at home! + all BUILDER rewards (tax-deductible portion: $23)
(NEW) T-SHIRT: Get your exclusive Lowline unisex t-shirt + all SEEDLINGS rewards.
TINKERER: Let's party! You're invited to a super fun event at the Lowline Lab in our opening week reserved just for Kickstarter supporters + all SEEDLING rewards (tax-deductible portion: $48)

INVENTOR (EARLY BIRD): Adopt a Plant at the Lowline Lab! (Here's what adoption means: we send you a photo of your special, unique plant and when you send us your plant's name, we'll do a special post to #LowlinePlants on instagram-- then you can come visit your pet plant at the lab, you can water it, take a joint photo or just have some peaceful quiet talks together) + all TINKERER rewards too! (tax-deductible portion: $73)
(NEW) TOTE: Get your exclusive Lowline totebag + all TINKERER rewards.

INVENTOR: Adopt a Plant at the Lowline Lab! (Here's what adoption means: we send you a photo of your special, unique plant and when you send us your plant's name, we'll do a special post to #LowlinePlants on Instagram-- then you can come visit your pet plant at the lab, you can water it, take a joint photo or just have some peaceful quiet talks together) +  all TINKERER rewards too! (tax-deductible portion: $98)

MAGICIAN (Early Bird): Get a limited edition, charred wood* Lowline Plant-In-City "Mobius" Terrarium with wired aluminum and steel web sculpture inspired by the Lowline’s solar technology and with plants that you might find in the future park! 
*Shou Sugi Ban process, of burning wood to protect wood from decay, pests, wind, water, sun and fire (tax-deductible portion: $108)

MAGICIAN: Get a limited edition, charred wood* Lowline Plant-In-City "Mobius" Terrarium with wired aluminum and steel web sculpture inspired by the Lowline’s solar technology and with plants that you might find in the future park! 
*Shou Sugi Ban process, of burning wood to protect wood from decay, pests, wind, water, sun and fire (tax-deductible portion: $158)

ALCHEMIST: Now we're getting fancy.  You're invited to a evening "picnic" party with the Lowline team, inside the Lowline Lab space, during opening week + all MAGICIAN rewards (tax-deductible portion: $408)

FRIEND: Get a limited edition charred wood* Lowline Plant-In-City Classic Terrarium with wired aluminum and steel web sculpture inspired by the Lowline’s solar technology and with plants you might find in the future park! + all ALCHEMIST rewards (except MOBIUS terrarium- you can choose either but not both).  *Shou Sugi Ban process, of burning wood to protect wood from decay, pests, wind, water, sun and fire (tax-deductible portion: $623)

COOL FRIEND: Heads up! You're joining a hard hat tour of the Lowline Lab before the general public gets to see it, with the Co-Founders, engineers, designers, and Lowline team + FRIEND rewards (select either small or large Lowline Plant-In-City model) (tax-deductible portion: $1,877)

MAD SCIENTIST:  Get the ultimate charred wood Lowline Plant-In-City Light Terrarium with a wired black steel, aluminum and fiber optic web sculpture, illuminated by an LED lighting system, which merges the light, technology and horticulture of the Lowline all into one cool art piece! + all COOL FRIEND benefits (not including small and large terrariums- you can choose any of the three but not all)
 *Shou Sugi Ban process, of burning wood to protect wood from decay, pests, wind, water, sun and fire  (tax-deductible portion: $4,248)
